summary: A woman and her lover are tortured and killed by her sadistic husband. The pair return from the grave to seek vengeance.
cast: Barbara Steele|Paul Muller|Helga Liné|Marino Masé|Giuseppe Addobbati|Rik Battaglia
keywords: gothic horror|suspicion|mysterious event|earrings|back from the dead
director: Director: Mario Caiano (as Allen Grünewald, Allan Grunewald)
title: Amantes de ultratumba
